TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1454-1455
TEI.2.document_title: John Austin to Stephen F. Austin, 09-13-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: John Austin to Austin, September 13, 1826. Asking for ginning supplies and other supplies.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1454-1455

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*John Austin to Austin, September 13, 1826. Asking for ginning supplies and other supplies.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="09-13-1826">Septr 13th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*D'Sir*/p*
*p*I send *person_mentioned*Keller */person_mentioned*to get some hair for the brush of the *location_mentioned*Gin*/location_mentioned*, horse hair from the tail is best if *person_mentioned*Antonio */person_mentioned*is in *location_mentioned*town */location_mentioned*expect it can be got from him about 5 lb will do—I expect to have the *location_mentioned*Gin */location_mentioned*ready in the course of 4 weeks I have got *person_mentioned*Mr. Battle*/person_mentioned* to assist *person_mentioned*Ramey*/person_mentioned*, I have been obliged to hire *person_mentioned*McCoy */person_mentioned*for 1 month at 30$ cash it was a case of necessity without the money I could not get him, I am obliged to call on you for that amount and 22$ which I borrowed from *person_mentioned*Keller*/person_mentioned* for provisions and whisky at the Raising of the *location_mentioned*Gin House*/location_mentioned* Your *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*made an arrangement with *person_mentioned*J. H. Moore*/person_mentioned* for 2 Beefs at *person_mentioned*Henry Jone*/person_mentioned*'s they cannot be drove from his cattle it is impossible to get them, *person_mentioned*Col. Pettus*/person_mentioned* has 2 Beefs with our Cattle I wish you would make an arrangement to get them and let me know by the return of *person_mentioned*Keller*/person_mentioned*—Your *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*told me that he had sent by *person_mentioned*Richardson */person_mentioned*for Bale Rope and Bagin I am told that he has not brought it—that article will be an object of good profit as well as accomodation if you could send to *location_mentioned*N. Orleans*/location_mentioned* and have it brought by the first opportunity have you any thing brought by *person_mentioned*Richardson */person_mentioned*that you wish me to Look after If you have sugar and Coffee I should like to get some as nothing less than cash will get it here at 37 1/2 c for coffee and 18 3/4 for sugar When do you expect your *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*home—I am your humble Servt.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Austin.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*P. S. If you have not filled up the deed of the *location_mentioned*Bernard League */location_mentioned*in my name I wish if you have an opportunity of letting some other person have it you would do so, it is not a valuable tract, you mentioned that the *location_mentioned*Fort tract*/location_mentioned* was vacant I should be pleased with that or any other that may be vacant the *location_mentioned*Bernard tract*/location_mentioned* does not answer the description given of it by considerable it is improved*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. A*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*The hire of *person_mentioned*McCoy*/person_mentioned*___$30.00*/p*
*p*Borrowed from *person_mentioned*Keller */person_mentioned*for ----------2*/p*
*p*1 Bbl. Pork----------------13$*/p* *p*4 Galls Whiskey------------6-*/p*
*p*1 Keg Sdr-------------------2-*/p* *p*1 Barrel--------------------1*/p*
*p*22-*/p*
*p*22.00*/p*
*p*$52.00*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Felipe de A */location_mentioned*pr. *person_mentioned*Keller*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Your *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*borrowed some time since 5$ from *person_mentioned*Keller */person_mentioned*which he is in want of if convenient with you.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. A.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
